title: Bob Ross: Painting Tree Tunic Dress
features: OFFICIAL LICENSED COSTUME: Everyone's favorite celebrity art instructor is none other than the beloved Bob Ross! With his soft voice & happy little trees, he brought lots of joy to painting! Now you can bring joy to any party wearing this painting dress costume!
CREATE GREAT GROUP COSTUMES: Now you can bring lots of joy to your next party with this kit costume! Goes great with Rasta Imposta Bob Ross Kit Costume (sold separately).
INCLUDES: Costume includes a pullover tunic dress printed with happy little trees and little fluffy clouds.
EXCELLENT QUALITY: Expertly designed for you with precision and care by the Rasta Imposta team in Runnemede, NJ, USA.
EASY WEAR & CARE: 100% Polyester. Freshen with steamer or cool iron.
description: Become a work of art in this captivating Bob Ross painting costume. You'll be full of happy little trees in this outfit. Everyone will experience The Joy of Painting when they lay eyes on you. This tunic is a real atention getter, so start a conversation by wearing it to your next costume party. It only takes a stroke to get this amazing Bob Ross: Painting Tree Tunic Dress from Costume SuperCenter!
